content: Ok, I am going to talk to you about this while eating and then we'll get back to notion when I'm back at my desk. I feel like this may be one of the greatest business ideas of all time, to build this and sell it. I'm even thinking that families could use it and once grows in power, entire organizations to have AI drive strategy knowing everyone's abilities. Helping families work to support family goals/cohesion while supporting each individuals goals. Is this crazy? Be honest.
